document_data.name: Thoroun
document_data.mainbody: '''Thoroun''' was a weapons master and senior member of [[The Hands (Thay)|the Hands]] of [[Thay]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was known to operate within the [[Inner Sea]], working a campaign against the [[Harpers]]' activity within the region.{{Cite dragon/277/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Soargar's Legacy|87}}
document_data.Description: Thoroun was a stocky man, who bore many scars from a life of combat and martial prowess.
document_data.Possessions: The agent of Thay was known to wear gray [[leather armor]] and wielded the [[scimitar]] known as ''[[Ashram]]'' for a time, after it was in the possession of a fellow member of the Hands, [[Daryn Mellas]].
document_data.History: In [[Uktar]] [[1370 DR]], he killed a group of ruffians in a bar within the city of [[Proskur]], just west of [[Cormyr]]. After this incident he left town and headed eastward.
